info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33835
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33835
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com mx ~all"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=NyHd6FyFGQgiTZMCZdJwWDukGFsnszDKIZlkUMsWoTk"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=r43u1TlUNwX2ug3-1NeKDSK8LX6v_UbyEttaLP6HaUs"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:e0920d905f78449e853353b91dc54f82"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33835
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 33835
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 4, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com mx ~all"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=NyHd6FyFGQgiTZMCZdJwWDukGFsnszDKIZlkUMsWoTk"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=r43u1TlUNwX2ug3-1NeKDSK8LX6v_UbyEttaLP6HaUs"
le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"Sendinblue-code:e0920d905f78449e853353b91dc54f82"

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

extracted-results: "v=DMARC1; p=none; sp=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"
request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 50211
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.le.taxi.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 50211
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.le.taxi.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.le.taxi.	10800	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; sp=none; rua=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; ruf=mailto:dmarc@mailinblue.com!10m; rf=afrf; pct=100; ri=86400"

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35324
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 35324
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
le.taxi.	10800	IN	NS	ns-170-a.gandi.net.
le.taxi.	10800	IN	NS	ns-245-b.gandi.net.
le.taxi.	10800	IN	NS	ns-156-c.gandi.net.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8495
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 8495
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
le.taxi.	10800	IN	MX	10 spool.mail.gandi.net.
le.taxi.	10800	IN	MX	50 fb.mail.gandi.net.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18462
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18462
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;le.taxi.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
le.taxi.	10800	IN	SOA	ns1.gandi.net. hostmaster.gandi.net. 1740009600 10800 3600 604800 10800

request:

Host: le.taxi
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

Ministère
chargé des
transports

60 000 taxis à portée de main

le.taxi, registre de disponibilité des taxis

  • Je recherche un taxi
  • Je suis un chauffeur taxi
  • Je suis un acteur public ou privé
  • Autres

➔ Notre mission

le.taxi est un service du Ministère des Transports à destination des chauffeurs de taxis en activité, des éditeurs de logiciel et des collectivités en charge des transports.

Nous ne nous adressons pas aux particuliers.

le.taxi : un service de l'État qui facilite
la commande immédiate de taxis

Je suis chauffeur taxi

Inscrivez-vous au registre le.taxi

Je recherche un taxi

Faites appel à un taxi tout de suite

Je souhaite faciliter l'accès au taxi

Vous développez une app ? un site ? Contactez l'équipe le.taxi

J'ai un autre besoin à préciser

Vous êtes professionnel et présentez un cas spécifique ? Contactez l'équipe le.taxi

La dernière actualité le.taxi

le.taxi arrive dans l'Appli M de Grenoble !

C'est une première nationale : l'offre taxis vient s'ajouter aux autres mobilités déjà disponibles (bus, tramway, vélo…).

Il sera maintenant possible de commander un taxi directement depuis l'Appli M.

Première métropole à intégrer le service, nous vous dévoilons les coulisses de notre partenariat.

le.taxi, une API qui facilite la rencontre entre l'usager et le taxi

Voir aussi : Qu'est-ce qu'une API ?

Nos partenaires publics et privés

Il sera maintenant possible de commander un taxi directement depuis l'Appli M.

Première métropole à intégrer le service, nous vous dévoilons les coulisses de notre partenariat.

le.taxi, une API qui facilite la rencontre entre l'usager et le taxi

Voir aussi : Qu'est-ce qu'une API ?

info.name: RDAP WHOIS
author: ricardomaia
sttlr
info.description:
RDAP (Registration Data Access Protocol) is a standard defined by the IETF to replace the whois protocol
in queries for information about Internet resource records such as domain names, IP addresses, and ASNs.

request:
GET /domain/le.taxi HTTP/1.1
Host: www.rdap.net
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
